narrative.title: 1St Armoured Division - 1941Q4
narrative.situation: British Armoured Division deployed in North Africa during 1941Q4.
narrative.objectives: Mobile armoured warfare - exploitation and pursuit of enemy forces
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

supply.notes: Division arrived Egypt November 13, 1941, immediately committed to Operation Crusader with marginal supply reserves

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Combined arms coordination with infantry support group

supply_states.notes: Division arrived Egypt November 13, 1941, immediately committed to Operation Crusader with marginal supply reserves
